system.novice: Navigator can add 5xIntelligence Bonus to any Manoeuvre Action or a Single Ballistic Skill Test to fire the starship's guns that strategic turn.
system.adept: Navigator can make -20 Perception Test, on success can spread Intelligence Bonus between ship's increasing Speed or Armour for 1 Strategic Turn, can't use this again for rest of starship combat. If test failed by 1+ DoF, suffer 2 Fatigue.
system.master: Same as Adept Level, but increases last for 1d5 Strategic Turns, but Navigator gains 2 Fatigue from power use, or 4 Fatigue if failing Perception Test by 1+ DoF.
